# invalidate()

**Instance Method**

Invalidates all currently shown ranges.

## Declaration

```swift
func invalidate()
```

## Discussion

Calling this method causes the system find panel to update its current state, and might trigger a new search using [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextSearching-3wkjv/performTextSearch(queryString:options:resultAggregator:)] (Swift) or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextSearching-53wjq/performTextSearchWithQueryString:usingOptions:resultAggregator:] (Objective-C) immediately after.

## Tracking search results

- **foundRange(_:searchString:document:)**: Adds a text range to the set of matches.
- **invalidateFoundRange(_:document:)**: Removes a text range from the set of matches.
- **finishedSearching()**: Finishes the search for text ranges.
- **allFoundRanges**: An ordered set of all the text ranges that match the search.
